alert.note: Alert for Grand Valley; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Mesa and south central Garfield Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 914 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms near De Beque, or 23 miles northeast of Grand Junction, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... De Beque around 925 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 52 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Grand Valley; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
